0.text: Bug 2301  [Import/Export] No save prompt before exporting (1GENMDK).

1.text: (Not a serious issue) Before entering the export wizard, the user should be prompted to save their work.

2.text: There is a good chance the user is planning to export the file they are currently editing and could easily forget to save.

3.text: If they are exporting, the user rarely checks the contents of the jar/zip so the exported work may not be what they desire.

4.text: Illustration: 1) open a .java file in a project 2) make some changes to the file, don't save 3) File->export (file system) 4) select the java file you were editing, export to your desktop 5) open the java file, note that your changes are not in the file    NOTES:
